title: EKNELIGODA DISAPPEARANCE CASE: JUDGE REPRIMANDS STATE COUNSEL
content: The petition regarding his disappearance of journalist Pradeep Ekneligoda, filed by his wife and two sons, was called up before the Court of Appeal yesterday, and justice W. L. Ranjith Silva reprimanded the state counsel for not filing objections so far on behalf of the respondents in the case.. The state counsel informed court that…
